 A representation of explicit substitution of a class for a variable, inferred from an implicit substitution hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
ceqsalg.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
ceqsalg.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsalg $p |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
